channel.title: Ultimate Bullseye!
channel.description: I wanna make a script for Ultimate Bullseye, and I need some ideas of how I could do it..

item.title: Ultimate Bullseye!
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

oranges12233:

Ah… I dunno how to use the spiral things, but I can search for bitmaps… but seen as the place that the board is in is random, it would be virtually impossible to do that…

How could you make a script for Ultimate Bullseye? You need to be an absolute professional at SCAR i would think. Because the target changes randomly all the time. The basic script would probably be to hold the ‘SPCAEBAR’ key for like 2 seconds then make it let go to shoot.

Read full topic

item.title: Ultimate Bullseye!
item.dc:creator: @aznph8playa aznph8playa
item.description:
@aznph8playa wrote:

Well I gave this some though earlier too… you could use bitmaps (try the different ones including tolerance and spirals to see if scar can locate the bullseye) then find a line using the position of the bitmap/bullseye in relation to the arrow and use some estimations on how the parabola that guides the bullseye is set up to determine the angle and the power needed for the bullseye. It will take a good deal of time and mathematical intuition.
About the parabolas: I’m not sure but I think neopets shows you the parabolas on the first few shots, maybe I’m thinking of another game?

Read full topic
